name: RoughRadio
0:
”Alexa play rough radio”
”Alexa ask rough radio to play”
”Alexa open rough radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rough radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ROUGH RADIO provides creative and curious heads with a new space for music discovery. Born in Rome and pretty much new in the scene, wants to build a community-led radio station broadcasting the best of underground music, grown-up/youth vibes and non-repetitive mainstream stuff.

This skill allows the user to listen to ROUGH Radio, a web Radio based in Rome. No special hardware or softwares are required, everyone can access the no-profit RRadio, which doesn't run any ads and is legally register within the royalties company SIAE in Italy.

To start the Radio, ask Alexa:

Alexa play rough radio
Alexa open rough radio
Alexa ask rough radio to play
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
